dmStatus.reasonForUpdate: Initial release of Aft Bulkhead performance test procedure

levelledPara.title: Aft Bulkhead Performance Test Procedure
levelledPara.para: This data module describes the performance test procedure for the Center Body Aft Bulkhead (53-10-20).

levelledPara.title: Test Objectives
levelledPara.para: To verify that the Aft Bulkhead meets all structural performance requirements and design specifications under expected operational loads.

levelledPara.title: Prerequisites
levelledPara.para: Before performing this test, ensure the following conditions are met:

listItem.para: Component is properly installed per installation procedures
All supporting structure is in place
Test equipment is calibrated and operational
Safety precautions are in place

warning.warningAndCautionPara: Ensure all personnel are clear of the test area before applying loads.

caution.warningAndCautionPara: Do not exceed the maximum test loads specified in this procedure.

levelledPara.title: Required Test Equipment
levelledPara.para: The following test equipment is required:

listItem.para: Load frame with capacity of 100 kN minimum
Strain gauges and data acquisition system
Displacement measurement devices (LVDTs or equivalent)
Torque wrench (calibrated, 0-200 Nm range)
Temperature sensors for thermal monitoring
Verify that all prerequisites have been met.
Install strain gauges at designated measurement points as shown in the test specification.
Connect the data acquisition system and verify all channels are functioning.
Apply preload of 5 kN and hold for 2 minutes to stabilize the structure.
Begin incremental loading in 10 kN steps up to 80% of design ultimate load.
Record strain, displacement, and temperature data at each load increment.
Hold at maximum test load for 5 minutes.
Unload in 10 kN steps, recording data at each decrement.
Perform visual inspection for any signs of damage or permanent deformation.

levelledPara.title: Acceptance Criteria
levelledPara.para: The Aft Bulkhead passes the performance test if:

listItem.para: No visible cracks, delamination, or permanent deformation observed
Maximum recorded strain is within design allowables
Permanent set after unloading is less than 0.05 mm
Load-displacement curve shows linear elastic behavior

levelledPara.title: Data Recording
levelledPara.para: Record all test data in the approved test report form. Include:

listItem.para: Date, time, and test personnel
Component serial number and configuration
Test equipment identification and calibration dates
All load, strain, displacement, and temperature measurements
Pass/fail determination and signatures
